page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: There are 2 Playgroups in the village for chilldren under 5. The Infants School was origanally part of the Church of England School until October,1963, when the County built a separate School.It has 125 pupils in 5 classrooms with a teaching head.The majority of children transfer to St.Leonards at age 7. St.Leonards school has 168 pupils,6 teachers and a headmaster.Age range 7 to 11 years.Main subjects are Maths, English,Social Studies,Art,Physical Activities and music. At 11 most children transfer to the Comprehensive School at Burnham-on-Crouch.A minority transfer to Grammar and Boarding School.
